channel.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
channel.description:
# *"Quickly! We must change history before our Future becomes history!"*
> # [color=00ffa4]The Time Traveler[/color] > ([color=00ffa4]Anachronistic[/color] Special) > ## Passives > **Future tech** - Death and bleed immune. > ## Day Abilities > **Nanobots** - Cause a player to start bleeding. They will die in 2 nights unless healed. (**3 uses**) > **Bogus Magic** - All members of the [color=00ffa4]Anachronistics[/color] will be immune to the affects of magic users. The magic user will be informed that their abilitiy either failed (Such as the Sorcerer) that their ability didn't trigger (Like the Chronomancer if they delayed an attacked Anarchonistic, the delay would fail) (Magic users include: Chronomancer, Court Wizard, Mystic, Princess if using Will o Whisp, Possessor if being Possessed or being used to attack someone else, The Reaper, and The Sorcerer (No one will die if they are a walking bomb)) (**1 use**) > # Night Abilities > **Brain Implant** Convert someone into the [color=00ffa4]Anachronistic[/color] faction. (**Inf uses**) > **History Search** Determine if someone has a killing ability or if they possess royal blood. > *Your goal is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
Idk what to call the 2nd Anachronistic or the hardcounter to them

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
I kinda fixed it / made it more clear. Anything in parenthesis would not be included in the class description.

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: MathBlade
item.description:
Immune to invests like Princess should return BD aligned or be occupied not immune. If they don’t get a result and no occupied message it confirms someone as an Anachronistic and that is the faction in the game

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
FoL chronologically takes place before the chronomancer had enough power to properly implement it. Grand trial was a test trial for the modern ToL trials

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I can imagine a chrono explaining to the court how he travels in time and how it works with a lot of drawings in the mud doing complex equations and then someone in the court says. “So this is a complex way of saying magic right?” And everyone just agrees with that guy and the chrono gives up explaining and accepts it

Read full topic

item.description:
Do it later. We’re going off of lore and nameso f abilites. We can argue about whether those boundaries are good or bad later

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

If I just gave you the raw mechanical aspect of the chronomancer with none of the flavor or lore then how could you figure out that they are magic?

Do you want to become a philosopher or not?

Read full topic

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Not my point. If I just gave you the raw mechanical aspect of the chronomancer with none of the flavor or lore then how could you figure out that they are magic?

That’s why it feels arbitrary. There is nothing about these classes that makes them magic. They’re just given the label because they look like what you think of as magic.

Read full topic

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
yeah

Read full topic

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Can we agree that the chronomancer uses magic or now?

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
No because he’s a time traveler

it’s technology

but by using it in the past it’s classified as magic to BD

Read full topic

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Either way, can we agree that a chronomacer, in their current time with their tech, could not be reasonably able to be said to use technology to help them?

Read full topic

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Actually that’s because cell phones are just magic

Read full topic

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Chrononmancer is a time traveler

Technically, by blue dragons standards he’s magic. Just like if you showed a barbarian a cellphone it would be magic to them

It’s just highly advanced technology

Read full topic

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
No but like. If I told you there was a class that could prevent a death only for it to happen 2 nights later. And another class that just prevented a death forever.

Could you figure out which one is magic and which one isn’t?

Afterall if we want physician to be a magic user all we have to do is call them the cleric, nothing about the class has changed by doing this. Thus the only basis for calling a class magic is lore which isn’t part of the mechanics.

Royalty is a passive that can be tracked, alignment is tied to wincon and class types are ultimately based off the mechanics of the class being given the typing.

Read full topic

item.title: The Anachronistics (New Faction idea)
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Well I mean a Chronomancer transferring a death to someone else would be magic, no? And it would also be magic if they were to intervene with someone dying without using things found in the natural world.

Read full topic

Yes it felt arbitrary for the old inquisitor too
